entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,514Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 184

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: A Little Bit Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Blahblahblahblah9

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,632Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "Oh, you poor thing, look at you,” Derek cooed, gently prying the trap apart, “So strong, aren't you, little bunny?”The bunny made a soft clucking noise when it was finally free and hummed happily. It tried to hop away but crumpled in pain. Derek scooped it up, cradling the tiny bunny in his arms. He flashed his eyes at the bunny and stroked its back when it flinched away. “Don’t worry, I won’t hurt you. I promise. I’m gonna take you to a healer so you can get all better.” or, Derek finds bunny shifter Stiles stuck in a bear trap in the woods.

entry.title: 3 times Derek touched Stiles, +1 time Stiles took the first step
entry.summary:
Author: UrNewtmas_ObsessedGirl

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,619Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles has been pining after Derek since, well a long time. Derek has always been a little oblivious. Stiles thought he had no chance with the wolf until Derek actually started to show interest in him. First as friends, but those touches? Those weren't just friendly. There was a meaning behind those touches. And Derek? He knew very well what he was doing to Stiles with those touches. Making a little game of it, trying to see how far he'd come.But what happens when Stiles has enough of his little game and takes matters into his own hands?

entry.title: The New Alpha
entry.summary:
Author: TMRCookie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,192Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

entry.title: Secret
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,121Chapters: 37/61Kudos: 73

Summary: Stiles has had a shitty few days. He decides to go to Daeton and make a very important decision. He is young and above all it had been a mistake.What will be the effect of this decision on the human's life? And on the other members of the pack?This story brings reality at its best. Originally published in Spanish on Wattpad in August 2020 and completed in November 2021.This story is my own.English is not my first language, I apologize in advance.

entry.title: Lay My Curses Out to Rest
entry.summary:
Author: sponfawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,750Chapters: 9/14Kudos: 56

Summary: "Are you there, God? It's me, Stiles. Look, I know I never really went to Mass or anything like a good Polish kid but could you do me a big one and have this whole thing be entirely Not related to the supernatural - hell, it could be super cartel related but no shapeshifters, or chaos spirits, or fear monsters, or deranged Hunters, or fucking human sacrifices of any kind. Just do this for once and I'll do whatever. Well, not whatever, but I dunno I'll be a good son. You like that “honor thy father” stuff, right? I'll honor the fuck out of my dad, even come to visit more often! Confucius will weep at the intensity of my filial piety. Deal? Just. PLEASE."It's 2027 - a decade since Stiles was last in Beacon Hills - and the FBI has sent Stiles back to investigate a smuggling case.ORIn which I attempt to write the kind of story I want to read. A future Sterek fic that: 1) is in character, 2) doesn't bash any characters, 3) fixes Davis' timeline, 4) doesn't have sex, 5) has some character interactions that don't just revolve around Sterek/Stiles/Derek, and 6) addresses Derek and Stiles' unique traumas.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,067Chapters: 11/19Kudos: 403

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.summary:
Author: Belladdictedd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,084Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 751

Summary: Agent Stiles Stilinski. The Level 7 young agent that succeeded STRIKE Team Delta, previously Blackwidow and Hawkeye’s unit before they were assigned to the Avengers Initiative. An expert in hand-to-hand combat, excellent marksmanship, exceptionally intelligent and quick on his feet. Highly regarded within the agency, he’s easy-going and known for going off the books and doing things his own special way. A young prodigy recruited by none other than Nick Fury himself. Who would’ve thought that he’d end up being the most wanted fugitive in the United States of America?
